user_query: I'm a travel blogger planning a trip to Europe. Can you find the airports in France and Italy? Also, fetch the direct flights available from Air France departing from Paris Airport. Moreover, provide me with the live traffic data for my current location to plan my journey to the airport.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of airports in France.
Fetch the list of airports in Italy.
Fetch direct flights available from Air France departing from Paris Airport.
Fetch live traffic data for the user's current location to plan the journey to the airport.
